items.text: short, angling away into a fairly wide line outside off. Looks to open his bat face and ramp it over the wide slip, but can't put bat to ball
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Last over of the first Powerplay. Holder returns.
items.text: length ball angling across to off stump. Takes a big step back and across, then forward and across, and drives to the left of mid-on

length ball on middle stump, stays leg-side of the ball and bunts it gently into the off side with soft hands. They quickly decide on the quick single, and Tamim makes it easily to the striker's end, defying Holder's attempt to kick the ball into the stumps, which misses anyway
down the track comes Tamim, and Holder slants it wide of off stump. Goes for the big flat-bat hit over the covers, fails to connect
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short on off stump, takes a big step across and pulls in the air, on the bounce to the left of deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, opens his bat face and steers to third man. That brings up Bangladesh's 50

again short on off stump, and again he looks to shuffle across and pull. He's looking to go over short fine leg, but can't get it as fine as he'd like, or off the middle of his bat either, and it lands somewhere between that fielder and the man at deep square leg

items.preText: The difference between this match and T20 will be the next 14 overs, with only four men allowed on the boundary.
items.text: bang. Length ball angling across to off stump, and he takes a step out of his crease, moving away from the line to make himself swinging room, and smacks it between the umpire and the non-striker
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: four more. Down the track again, making a lot of room again, and he lofts the leg-stump length ball up and over wide mid-off. Doesn't quite middle it, but he gets it well over the fielder in the circle
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: down the track again, and this time Gabriel bangs it in short, invites Tamim to hit the shoulder-high ball over mid-off. Goes through with the shot, ends up hitting it high rather than far, and he ends up hitting it down the throat of Holder at mid-off. An exchange of words between Gabriel and Tamim as he makes his way off the ground

dismissal.text: Tamim Iqbal c Holder b Gabriel 18 (13b 2x4 0x6) SR: 138.46

items.preText:
Sabbir Rahman is in at No. 3.


Asif: "This is the kind of Soumya we were waiting to see for years. Finally coming into a gem of a form in the most crucial time."
items.text: back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and dabs to third man
bouncer angling down leg, misses the hook. Not called wide - wasn't too far from leg stump and he'd taken a step across anyway
items.shortText: Gabriel to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: big appeal, given! Back of a length, and it nips in and keeps a touch low, maybe. Looks to work it leg side and the ball beats his inside edge and hits front pad. Given out by Richard Kettleborough, and there's no DRS, so Sabbir will have to walk back even though it may juuust have been going down leg. We'll have to watch a few replays to know for sure

dismissal.text: Sabbir Rahman lbw b Gabriel 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: overpitched, lots of width, and even though cover point is out on the boundary there's no stopping this drive, timed so sweetly into the gap to the left of the fielder
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: fullish on off stump, and Soumya kind of outsmarts himself by taking a big, premeditated step back into his crease. Gets a touch too far underneath the ball in the attempt to hit over mid-off, so he doesn't quite get the desired power on it, but it doesn't matter. Clears the fielder and rolls down to the boundary
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball angling away from off stump, big slash and miss with an angled bat
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length, angling away from off stump, steered down to third man
shortish on middle stump, a bit of extra bounce, drops the bottom hand while defending back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away to fine leg

items.preText:
Vernon: "A message to all the Bangladesh fans. I am a West Indian and I want Bangladesh to win this match and win it handsomely to. They deserve to win after thrashing West Indies in the previous two matches in this series. Also, West Indies bowling and fielding has been substandard and as a result they do not deserve to win here. Best of luck!"

Shahidul Islam: "@Asif, this is why I believe the selectors have him so many chances to Soumya, and I think he is worth it. He is the one match winner player for Bangladesh. And he and player like Liton das could be leading next generation Bangladesh team. "
items.text: back of a length, angling into the pads, clipped away through square leg
back of a length on middle stump, looks to stay leg-side of the ball and dab into the backward point region - the fielder moves in quickly and denies the single
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: that's Bangladesh's fourth-fastest ODI fifty. Shortish, a bit of width, has to reach for the ball and he carves it over backward point, to the left of third man
short, gets up to shoulder height on off stump, and Mushfiqur controls his hook really well to hit it along the ground to deep square leg
bam, Shoulder-high short ball close to off stump, and he seems to be expecting it, pulls it in the air, over midwicket
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: shortish close to off stump, chopped down to third man, rolling his wrists over on top of the bounce
